message: انا جتلي فكرة كده وحابب اتناقش فيها، لو شخص ما حب يعرف كام واحد على الفيس بوك حاطط صورة شخصية معينة او شعار معين، هل ده ممكن؟

data.message: اعتقد لما مثلا يقولوا كام الف مستخدم عامل شعار كذا احتمال كبير يكون ليها view معينة عند الشركة نفسها اللي بتدير الفيس اصلا هما اللي ممكن يكون عندهم احصائيات زي كدة , او مثلا لو نفس الصورة ينفع تشترك في signature معينة عشان يقدروا يعرفوا كدة من قاعدة البيانات مش عارف صراحة انا كل اللي بقولوا دا تخيل مش اكتر :D

هوا الجراف بتعرف منه الصورة عادي لكن نفس الصورة كام واحد حاططها دي مش عارف صراحة ,
Emad Elsaid هل في حاجة زي كدة ممكنة ؟
ممكن عن طريق خدمة زي Google image reverse search تقدر تعمل بحث وتحصر حاجة زي كده
Yes you are right Ahmed but I think I need other service like Google image reverse search API instead of writing my own code.

According to stackoverflow: There is now Google Custom Search which allows image searches.

https://developers.google.com/custom-search/json-api/v1/overview

Question's Link: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10141800/google-search-by-image-api

i don't think Google include Facebook images in their results  , i think you will need to do the check yourself  , the quick & dirty way is just generate hashes from the image data  and then compare hashes 

but good luck indexing & processing all this data  :)
Mohamed Abdel Aty how to create hashes from image data ??
Yup it's just for fun Mohamed Abdel Aty I'm testing it on my laptop maybe to use this idea in something bigger someday, Thanks for your suggestion I appreciate it.
Thank you Ahmad Abd-Elghany for your valuable suggestions, Yes I will look for open source project for that purpose, Thanks for help.

Abdulrahman Mohamed  somthin like this might theoretically work 

$filehash = md5_file($image );

but this will not work i think here , because Facebook could be addeding different metadata for similar images , resulting in diffrent hashes 

this is an interesting article about "Perceptual hash" which could be more accurate in this case  ,   i recommend reading it 

http://www.hackerfactor.com/blog/index.php?/archives/432-Looks-Like-It.html
Thank you Mohamed Abdel Aty I will read it when I wake up :)

اذا في مطور ما عدا من هنا ومهتم بتطوير الأداة دي يقدر يدخل على الكود من هنا ويعمل commit :
https://github.com/jadolyo/FBpp

سؤال للناس الي تجاوبت معايه في الموضوع ده ايه اﻷفضل Scraper وﻻ Crawler ؟ 
ولو في اي حد عنده فكرة عن الموضوع وكيفية تنفيذه.

They are not the same thing. Both of them are important and they do different things

Crawler mainly something like google it visit all links submit all forms and may try to download or index pages 

Scraper is more advanced and intelligent it extract a specific information from a specific site 

Any crawler can work with any site but scraper is designed for that site at the current state
I got it now, That I was asking about then it's scraper thank you.
